mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_USER ( ID, USERNAME, REMARK, EMAIL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, MARK ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{remark}, #{email}, now(), now(), '1' )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_USER SET USERNAME = #{username}, REMARK = #{remark}, email = #{email}, UPDATE_TIME= NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE SYS_USER SET MARK = '0', UPDATE_TIME= NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SYS_USER WHERE MARK = '1' AND USERNAME LIKE '%${username}%' AND EMAIL LIKE '%${email}%'
SELECT * FROM SYS_USER WHERE MARK = '1' AND ID = #{id}
